title: 6 Important Ways to Cope With Deployments

Playing Spades until the sand blasts the face and numbers cards out. Todays politics remind me of an old saying. - "Ideas are more powerful than guns. We would not let our enemies have guns, why should we let them have ideas?" - Joseph Stalin
